about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a software developer passionate about creating innovative solutions. I have experience with various technologies and always strive to learn more.

jobs.description: Build, style, and maintain high-quality, responsive web applications. Develop server-side logic and APIs with Node.js to support front-end functionality and optimize performance. Collaborate closely with the development team to implement new features, troubleshoot and debug issues, and enhance the user experience. Write clean, efficient, and well-documented code, and assist in the deployment and monitoring of web applications. This role has provided me with hands-on experience in modern web development practices and has significantly enhanced my skills in creating dynamic digital experiences.

projectList.name: Project 1
projectList.description: A task management application developed with React and Firebase.
